professional_summary: Highly skilled AI/ML Engineer with expertise in developing and deploying scalable machine learning solutions using Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn. Proven ability to design and execute end-to-end ML pipelines, optimize models for production, and leverage cloud technologies like AWS and Django for data-driven applications. Passionate about healthcare AI and leveraging machine learning to enhance automation, accuracy, and operational efficiency.

work_experience.company: Ananthalakshmi Institute of Technology and Sciences at Anantapur
responsibilities: Designed and deployed end-to-end healthcare AI pipelines on AWS using Python, TensorFlow/Keras, and Computer Vision, leveraging Amazon S3 and EC2 to process and analyze high-resolution Whole Slide Images (WSIs) at scale.

Integrated Model Context Protocol (MCP) using AWS API Gateway, Lambda, and ECS to securely connect LLMs, clinical data sources, inference services, and analytics tools for controlled system orchestration.

Developed and optimized CNN-based detection and segmentation models (YOLO, U-Net, Mask R-CNN) using EC2-based training and inference environments for automated nuclei detection and pathology analysis.
Built and deployed classification models, integrating outputs with Amazon S3, and Amazon Redshift to enable large-scale analytics, reporting, and audit-ready data warehousing.
Implemented data augmentation, normalization, and class imbalance handling techniques to improve model robustness, generalization, and clinical reliability.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs using Fast API (Python) to support scalable web applications, data processing, and model-driven services.
Deployed and managed cloud-native applications on AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3), enabling reliable backend services and support for machine learning inference where required.
Designed and deployed backend and web services on cloud platforms using Docker for containerized, repeatable, and efficient deployments.
Diagnosed and resolved file system, data flow, and application issues by analyzing logs and implementing corrective actions to maintain system stability.
Collaborated closely with frontend engineers, data/ML teams, designers, and QA to ensure smooth integration and adherence to engineering best practices.

education.degree: B. TECH in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
education.institution: Ananthalakshmi Institute of Technology and Sciences at Anantapur
